parameters.name: DescribeAICInstances
parameters.description:
Spcifies whether the result contains the container information. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: EnsRegionIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Edge Node Service (ENS) nodes.

parameters.name: MaxDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the 2006-01-02 format. By default, the time range to query is not restricted.

parameters.name: MinDate
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the 2006-01-02 format. By default, the time range to query is not restricted.

parameters.name: OrderByParams
parameters.description:
The sorting order of the results to return. Valid values: ServerIdSort, ServerNameSort, ExpireTimeSort, CreationTimeSort, and EnsRegionIdSort.

asc: ascending order. desc: descending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Pages start from page **1**.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. The maximum value is **100**.

Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: ServerIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the ARM servers.
